title: Rachel Reeves Plans Her Big Budget
summary: Rachel Reeves is the Chancellor, and she is getting ready to announce her budget. A budget is a plan for how the government will spend money. She has been working on it for months with her team. Her main goals are to lower the cost of living, reduce NHS waiting lists, and cut the national debt. Many people are worried because the country has a lot of debt and high taxes. Some in her party are afraid, and others are skeptical that she can succeed. The budget will be shared soon, and everyone is watching to see what happens.

background_read: A budget is like a big plan for a country's money. The Chancellor is the person who makes this plan. In the UK, the government uses money from taxes to pay for things like schools, hospitals, and roads. Sometimes, the country has debt, which means it owes money. Rachel Reeves is trying to fix problems like high costs and long waits for doctors. People are watching to see if her plan will work.
Article_Structure: WHAT: Planning a budget to cut costs, NHS waits, and debt
